name: Fire Fire Fire
description:
Welcome to Fire Fire Fire

A Not so Completed Game

I have plans to continue working on this in the future because I found it fun (and challenging) to develop. Maybe i'm looking at it through rose tinted glasses but I think there's a light based puzzler waiting to emerge. Anyway(s)...

Controls:

WASD: move

SPACE: pick up fire / drop fire (note: be facing and next to the fire to pick it up, you cannot place fire inside a wall)

Objective?:

Try to get the fire within line of sight of the receiver, then it will open a corresponding door.

Known Glitches:
* overractive friction

* disappearing fire

* yes i know that there's no collision on the door
